channel.title: 07 Vote live [Lets get that 500k Votes :D]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.runescape.com/img/poll/2007server/title.png?1[/img] [/center] Guys. We are getting 07 scape back. Everyone with a members acc, vote now: http://services.runescape.com/m=poll/c=2yxIiIdqQKA/rs2007-server
250k Votes reached. Great job. Now lets see that 500k hahaha.
[img]http://puu.sh/25ISL/566a61a333][/img]
For all questioning the integrity of the above post: http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/l=0/sl=0/forums.ws?317,318,490,64252433#2

“Regular membership polls to decide new content” … Worried about this, hoping they don’t add a poll saying “let’s add the GE or gwd!” or something similar because that’ll screw the game right up.
[/quote]On the suggestions/feedback part of the forum theirs a sticky that say "Do not suggest Grand Exchange, God Wars, any thing from the EoC basically.[/quote]

Oh thank god.

item.title: 07 Vote live [Lets get that 500k Votes :D]
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:566, topic:485992”][quote author=xI c E link=topic=604225.msg4246429#msg4246429 date=1362113635]
“Regular membership polls to decide new content” … Worried about this, hoping they don’t add a poll saying “let’s add the GE or gwd!” or something similar because that’ll screw the game right up.
[/quote]
I’m sure they’re working on Construction right now, since they disabled it. I’m assuming they disabled it due to bugs/glitches. Wouldn’t want another Falador Massacre now would we?

Edit: 2,000 post right here lol.[/quote]
Maybe we would

As of contents, I’d like to see revision changes (Wouldn’t mind the XP counter, possibly different client revision.)
Not all updates are bad, but yes, no .G.E or GWD please.

Read full topic

item.title: 07 Vote live [Lets get that 500k Votes :D]
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

The poll just closed.

“There will be no extra membership fee for at least 6 months. We will review this again in September and if the community is still active and growing then it will remain free.”

That’s all I wanted to hear. Hopefully the community will stay active so we won’t have to pay an extra $5.00

Read full topic

item.title: 07 Vote live [Lets get that 500k Votes :D]
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:549, topic:485992”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=604225.msg4244329#msg4244329 date=1362019594]

You must be a member on current RuneScape to even have access to RuneScape '07. If it hits 500k, which it most likely will, membership on RS '07 will be free for current RS members. If it hits 750k, it will be free for every player, including free-to-play.

thought just the F2P part would be free to everyone.
[/quote]
Only if it hits 750k votes, yus ((it’s not)).[/quote]
Oh thank god, I got confused with the voting range. I thought we would still have to pay for membership, but free players could access the free worlds for no additional charge.

Read full topic
